projects.title: WLU Maps
projects.description:
- Built an interactive web app that helps Laurier students find available study spaces and classrooms in real time, complete with filters for amenities and time slots.
- Wrote a script to automatically gather and update class schedules, so students always have the latest info on open rooms.
- Worked with the university to move classroom bookings from a clunky email process to a much smoother online experience.

projects.title: Leetr
projects.description:
- Created a platform that makes technical interview prep more fun and effective, including a Chrome extension and a spaced repetition system that sends you reminders when it’s time to practice.
- Tracks your progress, gives you insights, and lets you compete with friends on leaderboards or send each other coding challenges.

projects.title: Huberman AI
projects.description:
- Made a chatbot that can answer medical questions using transcripts from a Stanford neuroscientist’s podcast.
- Used AI and smart search techniques to make sure the answers are accurate and relevant.
